com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform

Interface IDataQuery<DESC extends ISharedDataDescriptor,DATA extends ISharedData<DESC>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IBeanQuery, ITupleQuery
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBeanQuery, AbstractStorageQuery, NamedBeanQuery, NamedDataQuery, NamedTupleQuery

    public interface IDataQuery<DESC extends ISharedDataDescriptor,DATA extends ISharedData<DESC>>
extends java.io.Serializable
    Represents a query against data stored in a platform's data storage. The implementation must be serializable so we can send the query to the remote peers.
    Author:
    dawood

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isQueryMatch(DATA datum, ISharedDataPlatform platform, java.lang.Object userQueryData)
      Determine if the given data could be one of the results of this instance's query(ISharedDataPlatform, Object) method.
      java.util.List<DATA> query(ISharedDataPlatform platform, java.lang.Object userQueryData)
      Implements a query for the given application against the given data store.

    • Method Detail

      • isQueryMatch

        boolean isQueryMatch(DATA datum,
                   ISharedDataPlatform platform,
                   java.lang.Object userQueryData)
                     throws DSMException
        Determine if the given data could be one of the results of this instance's query(ISharedDataPlatform, Object) method. This is generally called when a piece of data is already in hand, in particular, during a new call to share the data.
        Parameters:
        datum - the piece of data which should be tested as possibly matching this instance's query(ISharedDataPlatform, Object) * method.
        platform - generally, the platform instance on which the query is being evaluated.
        userQueryData - this is data as provided to ISharedDataPlatform.setUserQueryData(Object) on the platform where the query is being evaluated.
        Returns:
        true if the given data would be contained in the results of the query(ISharedDataPlatform, Object) method.
        Throws:
        DSMException

      • query

        java.util.List<DATA> query(ISharedDataPlatform platform,
                         java.lang.Object userQueryData)
                                                     throws DSMException
        Implements a query for the given application against the given data store. The data store must already be connected when this method is called.
        Parameters:
        platform - the platform against which the query is being made.
        userQueryData - this is data as provided to ISharedDataPlatform.setUserQueryData(Object) on the platform where the query is being evaluated.
        Returns:
        never null, but perhaps empty list.
        Throws:
        DSMException
